remarks: If the first pick is a vote for B, A is not ahead throughout the count (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Nov-2016.)
statement:
ballotth.m $e |- M e. NN $.
ballotth.n $e |- N e. NN $.
ballotth.o $e |- O = { c e. ~P ( 1 ... ( M + N ) ) | ( # ` c ) = M } $.
ballotth.p $e |- P = ( x e. ~P O |-> ( ( # ` x ) / ( # ` O ) ) ) $.
ballotth.f $e |- F = ( c e. O |-> ( i e. ZZ |-> ( ( # ` ( ( 1 ... i ) i^i c ) ) - ( # ` ( ( 1 ... i ) \ c ) ) ) ) ) $.
ballotth.e $e |- E = { c e. O | A. i e. ( 1 ... ( M + N ) ) 0 < ( ( F ` c ) ` i ) } $.
ballotlem4 $p |- ( C e. O -> ( -. 1 e. C -> -. C e. E ) ) $.
$d C i $.
$d F c i $.
$d M c i $.
$d N c i $.
$d O c i $.
